  basic/Constraint.cpp
  basic/Graph.cpp
  basic/GraphAttributes.cpp
  basic/GraphCopy.cpp
  basic/Hashing.cpp
  basic/Math.cpp

  basic/basic.cpp
  basic/geometry.cpp
  basic/simple_graph_alg.cpp
  cluster/ClusterGraph.cpp
  cluster/ClusterGraphAttributes.cpp
  energybased/FMMMLayout.cpp
  energybased/MAARPacking.cpp
  energybased/Multilevel.cpp
  energybased/Set.cpp
  energybased/numexcept.cpp
  fileformats/DinoLineBuffer.cpp
  fileformats/DinoTools.cpp
  fileformats/DinoXmlParser.cpp
  fileformats/DinoXmlScanner.cpp
  fileformats/GmlParser.cpp
  fileformats/Ogml.cpp

  fileformats/XmlParser.cpp

  internal/energybased/FruchtermanReingold.cpp
  internal/energybased/MultilevelGraph.cpp
  internal/energybased/NMM.cpp
  internal/energybased/NodeAttributes.cpp
  internal/energybased/QuadTreeNM.cpp
  internal/energybased/QuadTreeNodeNM.cpp)

add_library(ogdf STATIC ${OGDF_SOURCES})
